content: I'm so excited to finally be planning my trip to South America, especially after just getting back from an amazing week-long trip to Bali with my closest friends. Now that I have a better idea of what to expect from my journey to the Galapagos Islands and the Amazon Rainforest, I'd like to ask about the best ways to stay healthy and safe during my trip. What are some essential vaccinations and medications I should consider, and are there any specific health risks I should be aware of in these regions?
